content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Maria., Maria just said to you: '"Grazie, Marco! That was handled beautifully."' What is your brief, natural reply?
You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Maria., Maria just said to you: '"Thanks, Marco! That was a smooth one."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Maria! Glad it went smoothly."
